ARGUMENT
y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mapsncnv.s | |- S = { X } |
| 2 |  | mapsncnv.b | |- B e. _V |
| 3 |  | mapsncnv.x | |- X e. _V |
| 4 |  | mapsncnv.f | |- F = ( x e. ( B ^m S ) |-> ( x ` X ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( x ` X ) e. _V |
| 6 | 5, 4 | #P_fnmpti | |- F Fn ( B ^m S ) |
| 7 |  | #P_snex | |- { X } e. _V |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_eqeltri | |- S e. _V |
| 9 |  | #P_snex | |- { y } e. _V |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_xpex | |- ( S X. { y } ) e. _V |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_mapsncnv | |- `' F = ( y e. B |-> ( S X. { y } ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_fnmpti | |- `' F Fn B |
| 13 |  | #P_dff1o4 | |- ( F : ( B ^m S ) -1-1-onto-> B <-> ( F Fn ( B ^m S ) /\ `' F Fn B ) ) |
| 14 | 6, 12, 13 | #P_mpbir2an | |- F : ( B ^m S ) -1-1-onto-> B |
